command.source: SELECT EXTL_SRC_CD, EXTL_LVL1_ID, EXTL_LVL2_ID, EXTL_LVL3_ID, EXTL_LVL4_ID, EXTL_LVL5_ID, RAC, LPAD(TRIM(CLIENT_NBR),8,'0'), PCS_SYSTEM_ID, CARRIER_GROUP_NAME, CG_EFF_DT, CG_TERM_DT, BA_NBR, AR_NBR, PCS_CLIENT_NBR, INSURANCE_CD, EDEN_INDICATOR, ECLIPS_LOAD_DT, GP1, GP2, GP3, GP4, CLIENT_TYPE_ECLIPS, FUNDING_TYPE, LCM, MDO_PHARMACY, UPDATE_USERID, INSRT_DATE FROM ${cli_schema}.carrier_group ORDER BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,9

target.target: INSERT INTO ${cli_schema}.carrier_group (EXTL_SRC_CD, EXTL_LVL1_ID, EXTL_LVL2_ID, EXTL_LVL3_ID, EXTL_LVL4_ID, EXTL_LVL5_ID, RAC, CLIENT_NBR, PCS_SYSTEM_ID, CARRIER_GROUP_NAME, CG_EFF_DT, CG_TERM_DT, BA_NBR, AR_NBR, PCS_CLIENT_NBR, INSURANCE_CD, EDEN_INDICATOR, ECLIPS_LOAD_DT, GP1, GP2, GP3, GP4, CLIENT_TYPE_ECLIPS, FUNDING_TYPE, LCM, MDO_PHARMACY, UPDATE_USERID, INSRT_DATE ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )

catch.command:
[ERROR] REFRESH CLIENT - CARRIER_GROUP

#if (${system.getProperty('logfile')}) #end
Host:${localhost}
Started:${startTime}
Script:${scriptName}
Log File: ${system.getProperty('logfile')}


#if (${script.getLastStatement()})

Last Statement

${script.getLastStatement()}

#end

Stack Trace

${stackTrace}
